LookUpUserAuth.map: function(doc) { if(doc.type != 'sys_info') return; if(doc.servers) { var srvs = Iterator(doc.servers); for (var srv in srvs)  { if (srv[1].auth) { emit(srv[1].auth.auth_user, srv[1].auth); } } }}

LookUpUserAuthRealm.map: function(doc) { if(doc.type != 'sys_info') return; var realm = doc.account.auth_realm; if(doc.servers) { var srvs = Iterator(doc.servers); for (var srv in srvs)  { if (srv[1].auth) { emit([realm, srv[1].auth.auth_user], srv[1].auth); } } }}
